thread.title: Ticket Office Representative - College Sports

title: Ticket Office Representative - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Ticket Office Representative Posted/Updated: 10-21-2015 Brief Job Description: Representatives will assist the full time ticket office staff in several key functions, including daily office procedures and game day functions.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
